body: @ZiggyStardust : Because there are people that dig that. You're on the internet, haven't you figured out there's a fetish for EVERYTHING yet? Those of us that don't dig it just have to deal with it, and be thankful that means our kinks are provided as well. But hot DAMN, that's some good art AND a good story. I really dig the scenes with the girls just chilling off-duty.
Why do hentai artists think we want to see a fat ugly man?
There's only one or two more chapters left to translate. Did the translators run out on the project or is it still ongoing?
Hope to see the other chapters translated soon as well. Thanks!!
